about_the_game:
Embark on a strategic journey unlike any other in MOTU, a captivating blend of turn-based tactics and real-time action. Set foot on mystical islands teeming with resources, where every decision shapes your path to victory.

Engage in Two Dynamic Phases

Choose your fate in the Season Phase, where the island's bounty awaits. Harvest precious resources in real-time, daring to cross bridges to seize your opponent's treasures. But tread carefully, as clashes in this phase can shift the tide of battle. Opt to Build instead, constructing your domain away from prying eyes, fortifying your stronghold for the impending showdown.

Unleash Tactical Brilliance in the Strategy Phase

Seize control of your fortified domain and lead your army to conquest. Engage in intense turn-based combat, deploying cunning strategies to outmaneuver and outwit your opponent. Destroy enemy structures, commandeer tiles, and march towards their stronghold with unwavering determination. Victory lies within your grasp – if you have the wit and will to claim it.


  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience the thrill of turn-based strategy and real-time action seamlessly woven into two distinct phases.
  • Strategic Depth: Plan your moves meticulously in the Season Phase, then execute flawless tactics in the Strategy Phase to dominate the battlefield.
  • Resource Management: Harvest, build, and fortify your island to gain the upper hand in combat.
  • PvP Mayhem: Challenge friends or foes in intense 1v1 battles, where every decision matters.
